response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $12,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers to individuals like you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it at a special price of $11,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our exceptional product.", "product_price": 11000}
